post.author: Admin
post.title: Appeal from a Cancer Patient
post.content:
A 23 year old  patient suffering from brain tumor in Pakistan needs Rs 2 Million (around 26000 US Dollars ) for his treatment. I was aksed to request JDP visitors for help [more]

Following are the details

Patient's Name: Manzar Mehmood s/o Fiaz Ahmed
 
Bank Account Number: 01720100974903
 
Bank & branch: HBL Main Market Gulberg Lahore
 
Contact Person: Mubasher Hassan Khan
 
Contact Number cell: +92-321-426-4196
 
Contact Number res: +92-42-541-0682

Email: mubasher.1188@gmail.com

PS: Please contact Mubsasher Hassan Khan directly for further information.

thanks

Admin
